page.title: 09ARMLEY TOWN STREET- W.LEEDS
page.content: Armley Town Street is the main shopping area in Armley. Situated two miles from the centre of Leeds it serves the local community. The street is nearly a mile in length. There is along or near it almost every amenity the people of Armley need-shops, pubs, clubs, swimming baths, a sport centre, library, clinic, banks and building societies. Halfway along the street is Armley Moor, where Armley Feast (Fair) is held alternate years. The street is a busy, lively place during shopping hours. Crowded with people and traffic it is a meeting place for the people of Armley. Many shop there daily and live within walking distance. Others come by car or bus. It is easy for those living in Armley to do all their shopping in Armley Town Street and never go to the shops in nearby Leeds.
